item.title: Cloud dependencies
item.description: Join me on the Software Engineering Daily podcast. In this episode, Jeff and I discuss my personal project deps.cloud. We discuss benefits and tradeoffs to leveraging monorepos as well as challenges mainting source control at a large organization. I hope you enjoy the show!
